sourcesContent:
import React , { useState }from 'react';
import { Text,StyleSheet, View, TouchableOpacity,Image,Picker } from 'react-native';
const Icons =props => {
  const [selectedValue, setSelectedValue] = useState("java");
        return (
          <View>   
          <View style={styles.itemView1}>
          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.itemView2}> 
                    <TouchableOpacity  style={styles.TouchableOpacity}>
                    <View style={styles.container}>
                    <Image source={require('../assets/soliel.png')}  style={styles.Image}/>
                    <Picker
        selectedValue={selectedValue}
        style={{ height: 50, width: 50,color:'black' }}
        onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setSelectedValue(itemValue)}
      >
        <Picker.Item label="Java" value="java" />
        <Picker.Item label="JavaScript" value="js" />
      </Picker>
                    </View>
             </TouchableOpacity>
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>Température</Text> 
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>29°C</Text> 
                    <Image source={require('../assets/temperature.png')}  style={styles.Image2}/>
          </TouchableOpacity>

          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.itemView2}>
               <TouchableOpacity style={styles.TouchableOpacity}>
               <View style={styles.container}>
               <Image source={require('../assets/precipitation.png')}  style={styles.Image}/>
               </View>
             </TouchableOpacity>
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>Précipitation</Text> 
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>2 mm</Text> 
                    <Image source={require('../assets/precipitation1.png')}  style={styles.Image2}/>
          </TouchableOpacity>
          </View>

          <View style={styles.itemView1}>
          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.itemView2}>
               <TouchableOpacity style={styles.TouchableOpacity}>
               <View style={styles.container}>
               <Image source={require('../assets/vent1.png')} style={styles.Image}/>
               
               </View>
             </TouchableOpacity>
             
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>Humidité relative</Text> 
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>12%</Text> 
                    <Image source={require('../assets/humidité.png')}  style={styles.Image2}/>
          </TouchableOpacity>

          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.itemView2}>
               <TouchableOpacity style={styles.TouchableOpacity}>
               <View style={styles.container}>
               <Image source={require('../assets/song.png')} style={styles.Image}/>
               </View>
             </TouchableOpacity>
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>Rayonnement</Text> 
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>17 W/m</Text>
                    <Image source={require('../assets/rayoonnement.png')} style={styles.Image2} /> 
          </TouchableOpacity>
    
          </View>

          <View style={styles.itemView1}>
          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.itemView2}>
               <TouchableOpacity style={styles.TouchableOpacity}>
               <View style={styles.container}>
               <Image source={require('../assets/rayonnement.png')} style={styles.Image}/>
               </View>
             </TouchableOpacity>
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>Evatranspiration</Text> 
                    <Image source={require('../assets/temperature.png')}  style={styles.Image2}/>
          </TouchableOpacity>

          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.itemView2}>
               <TouchableOpacity style={styles.TouchableOpacity}>
               <View style={styles.container}>
               <Image source={require('../assets/vent.png')} style={styles.Image}/>
               </View>
             </TouchableOpacity>
                    <Text style={styles.itemText}>Vent</Text> 
                    <Image source={require('../assets/temperature.png')} style={styles.Image2} />
          </TouchableOpacity>
    
          </View>
         
        </View>
        );
      };
    // create style to component
    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
      TouchableOpacity:{
        marginLeft:50,
        marginTop:20,
        borderRadius: 500,
        width:75,
        padding:20,
        backgroundColor: 'white',
        shadowColor: "#000",
        shadowOffset: {
          width: 0,
          height: 16,
        },
        shadowOpacity: 0.58,
        shadowRadius: 16.00,
        
        elevation: 24,
      },
      container: {
        justifyContent: 'center',
        alignItems: 'center',
      },
      Image:{
        justifyContent: 'center',
      },
      itemView1: {
       
        flexDirection: 'row'
      },
      itemView2: {
        backgroundColor: 'white',
        height:170,
        width:170,
        margin:10,
        marginRight:5,
        marginLeft:5,
        shadowColor: "#000",
        shadowOffset: {
          width: 0,
          height: 16,
        },
        shadowOpacity: 0.58,
        shadowRadius: 16.00,
        
        elevation: 24,
      },
      itemFont: {
       borderRadius: 500,
       width:90,
       padding:20,
       shadowColor: "#000",
       shadowOffset: {
         width: 0,
         height: 16,
       },
       shadowOpacity: 0.58,
       shadowRadius: 16.00,
       
       elevation: 24,
       
      },
      itemFont2: {
        color:'blue',
        fontSize:24,
        marginTop:20,
        marginLeft:40,
        backgroundColor: 'white',
        borderRadius: 500,
        width:70,
        padding:20,
        shadowColor: "#000",
        shadowOffset: {
        width: 0,
        height: 16,
        },
        shadowOpacity: 1,
        shadowRadius: 16.00,
        elevation: 24,
        
       },
      itemText:{
        textAlign: 'center',
        marginTop:5,

      },
      Image2:{
        width:160,
        marginLeft:5,
        marginTop:5
      }
      });
    //Export to component so we can use it elsewhere in our project
    export default  Icons ;
